title: Konjalaai Lyrics Yatchan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Yatchan Konjalaai Song Lyrics
Artist(s): Yuvan Shankar Raja & Tanvi Shah
Music: Yuvan Shankar Raja

Azhage unnai paarthen
Asandhey naanm ponen
Idhazhey, eera idhazhey
Ayyayo naanum saaindhen

Chi podi unmugam kodi
nilavena minnum appadi minnum
Unai ottikollavum urasi
kollavumn yengum en manam yengum.

Nee pogum paadhayil unnai thodarven
Salai engilum dhoosaai
konjam konjalaai ennai kolvaaya

Oh oh oonjalaai nenjorathil
 saingaalathile aadinaai,
Manjalaai thoo vaanathile
nee dhane therindhaai (2 times)

Enaena thaniyaai nadai paadhai
Adhil ennai en nizhalaai pin thodarndhaai
Or oruvindri thavidhidum ulagathiley
Enakaaga yengum pudhu uravum Neeyaaaa..

Adi ena enakenna aachu
Thalai keezhaai naatkalum pochu
Kadaisi paerundhukaaga
nirkum payani naan dhano.

Inam puriya inbam thunbam
Rendum ondraai endhan nenjil
yeno thaano endre aanenadi

Oru muthathaale
Ennai thithithaale
Imai orathale, veesi veesi pogiraai.

Ellam maari pochu
Ada yedho pudhusa aachu
Idhai veliye solla theriyadhamma
Konjam konjammma..

Nee Nee yaaradi
Ulla kallayum
veliye poovayum veesinaai
Pongadi kondatathile
rendaai nirkireney (2)
